page.title: 20Hopes for the Future
page.content: As an {adult}with children of my own, my hope is for a world free of war,fam ine,pestilence and fear.I long,also,fo r a world where the balance of nature is restored and pollution is a thing of the past.A{Child's view}of the futu re depends,to a large degree,upon the individual's age;the younger the child ,the more materialistic are its hopes and aspirations.However,the older chil dren have a wider aspect,thanks no dou bt to the influence of television.They are all concerned about the plight of those more unfortunate than themselves ,such as those who are starving abroad and those who are suffering from man made and natural disasters.They hope for a world where there is food and shelter for all,full employment,peace, prosperity,happiness,unpolluted countr yside and wides spread computerisation .Polticians are not popular.
